excerpt: Are you growing curious about the HBO Max release schedule from March 3 to March 9, 2025? Here is a list of releases.

text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for March 3 to March 9, 2025, includes The Nut Job (2014), The Nut Job 2 (2017), Smallfoot (2018), Jellystone Season 3B, and many others. On March 3, The Nut Job (2014) drops on HBO Max. The animated family comedy revolves around Surly, a squirrel who is abandoned by his community. Further, he decides to raid a nut store, but his plans go haywire when he realizes it is a front for thieves planning to loot a bank. Further, the film’s sequel, The Nut Job 2 (2017), will be available on the streaming platform. It showcases the ruthless mayor of Oakton City planning to destroy Liberty Park. As a result, Surly and his friends decide to fight against the authorities to protect their home. Later, Smallfoot (2018) will be available on HBO Max. The animated musical comedy focuses on an adorable yeti named Migo who is thrown out of his home after he claims the existence of human beings. However, he refuses to give up and decides to prove his theory to gain the respect of the villagers. Also coming out on HBO Max is Jellystone Season 3B. It chronicles the adventures of Huckleberry Hound, Cindy Bear, and Yogi Bear at Jellystone. The trio’s daily meetings often end up taking hilarious turns, leading to endless drama and laughter. New HBO Max releases for March 3 – March 9, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from March 3 – March 9, 2025 March 3 Celtics City (HBO Original) The Nut Job (2014) The Nut Job 2 (2017) Tournament of Champions, Season 6 (Food Network) March 4 Smallfoot (2018) March 5 Jay & Pamela, Season 1 (TLC) Road Rage, Season 3 (ID) March 6 Dylan’s Playtime Adventures, Season 1A (Max Original) Jellystone, Season 3B (Max Original) March 7 Heretic (A24) When No One Sees Us (Cuando Nadie Nos Ve), Season 1 (Max Original) March 9 The Righteous Gemstones, Season 4 (HBO Original) For more HBO Max content, check out the release date of Queer. Also, here is an update for The Penguin Season 2.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for March 3 to March 9, 2025, includes The Nut Job (2014), The Nut Job 2 (2017), Smallfoot (2018), Jellystone Season 3B, and many others.

On March 3, The Nut Job (2014) drops on HBO Max. The animated family comedy revolves around Surly, a squirrel who is abandoned by his community. Further, he decides to raid a nut store, but his plans go haywire when he realizes it is a front for thieves planning to loot a bank.

Further, the film’s sequel, The Nut Job 2 (2017), will be available on the streaming platform. It showcases the ruthless mayor of Oakton City planning to destroy Liberty Park. As a result, Surly and his friends decide to fight against the authorities to protect their home.

Later, Smallfoot (2018) will be available on HBO Max. The animated musical comedy focuses on an adorable yeti named Migo who is thrown out of his home after he claims the existence of human beings. However, he refuses to give up and decides to prove his theory to gain the respect of the villagers.

Also coming out on HBO Max is Jellystone Season 3B. It chronicles the adventures of Huckleberry Hound, Cindy Bear, and Yogi Bear at Jellystone. The trio’s daily meetings often end up taking hilarious turns, leading to endless drama and laughter.

New HBO Max releases for March 3 – March 9, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from March 3 – March 9, 2025

March 3

  • Celtics City (HBO Original)
  • The Nut Job (2014)
  • The Nut Job 2 (2017)
  • Tournament of Champions, Season 6 (Food Network)

March 4

  • Smallfoot (2018)

March 5

  • Jay & Pamela, Season 1 (TLC)
  • Road Rage, Season 3 (ID)

March 6

  • Dylan’s Playtime Adventures, Season 1A (Max Original)
  • Jellystone, Season 3B (Max Original)

March 7

  • Heretic (A24)
  • When No One Sees Us (Cuando Nadie Nos Ve), Season 1 (Max Original)

March 9

  • The Righteous Gemstones, Season 4 (HBO Original)

For more HBO Max content, check out the release date of Queer. Also, here is an update for The Penguin Season 2.
